doc:
Charlie Hall (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charlie_Hall_(actor) 0 Charlie Hall (19 August 1899 – 7 December 1959) was an English film actor. He is best known as the "Little Nemesis" of Laurel and Hardy. He appeared in nearly 50 films with them, making Hall the most frequent supporting actor in the comedy duo's productions. Charlie_Hall ( 19_August_1899 – 7_December_1959 ) was an_English_film_actor . He is_best_known as the_"_Little_Nemesis " of Laurel_and_Hardy . He appeared in nearly_50_films with them , making Hall the_most_frequent_supporting_actor in the_comedy_duo 's_productions .
